title: After Android 11 update my pixel often has a hard time 'waking up' and soft reboot required
content:
After the Android 11 update my device sometimes has a hard time waking up.  It does not happen when on the charger.  It does seem to happen after wifi status changes, either handoffs or leaving the house.  

I have followed most solutions I have found here that consists of: I have factory reset it, I have removed most 3rd party apps, I have set it to keep the screen on all the time, and it is still happening at least once a day.  It was happening as much as 2x per day.  I did run safe mode for awhile and it did not happen, but probably would need to go longer than the 12 hours I did.  

I am looking for more things to try.  Thanks.
